notes.text: SmartChart: support qualifiers for chart relevant annotations
SmartField: fetchValueListReadOnly property added
SmartFilterBar: support UI.SelectionFields annotation
SmartFilterBar: support for analytical parameters
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmartAreaMicroChart: Qualifier support added
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmartBulletMicroChart: Qualifier support added
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmartMicroChart: Qualifier support added
FilterBar: Cancel in Filters dialog should nor reset the variant
FilterBar: Select Filters-dialog without explicit content height
FilterBar: adapt the new design for the phone scenario
FilterBar: added padding for the buttons in dyn page scenario
FilterBar: consider page variants during setDataSuiteFormat call
FilterBar: correct toolbar handling in external variant scenario
FilterBar: correct usage is 'fieldName' instead of 'name'
FilterBar: correction for wrong expanded state
FilterBar: display only five filters on dynamic page
FilterBar: do not add filters to basic area during filters dialog interaction
FilterBar: enhanced solution for the search field aria labeling
FilterBar: ensure filter loaded during setDataSuiteFormat
FilterBar: initialise event is now triggered again in UI2 mode
FilterBar: more specific style class for filter labels
FilterBar: provide an APi for retrieving the filter label
FilterBar: remove aria-labeled for the basic search filter
FilterProvider: enhancing null check for analytical parameters
ODataControlFactory: Revert wrongly merged changes
SmartChart: do not change the page variant visibility
SmartChart: wrong type used for Measure/Dimension-Role
SmartField: Additional ARIA label will now only be added for unit of measure field
SmartField: Association ariaLabelledBy is now considered for UOM fields
SmartField: Binding is now restored when field control is destroyed
SmartField: Change event of ComboBox is now also exposed
SmartField: Height of UOM fields inside responsive table cell will now be aligned with other controls
SmartField: Issue with restoring FieldControl formatters is now solved
SmartField: Tooltip is now passed to input controls
SmartField: adding a fail safe check in the visibility formatter
SmartField: dateFormatSettings is expected to be an Object
SmartField: reset SideEffect flag when factory is destroyed
SmartFilter/ControlConfiguration: correct index handling
SmartFilterBar/ControlConfiguration: move enum types to library
SmartFilterBar: correct behavior during clear
SmartFilterBar: correction for wrong spelling of triggerSearch
SmartFilterBar: hide Go button in live mode scenario
SmartFilterBar: in liveMode search will lead to triggerSearch
SmartForm: Label for SmartField now gets a stable Id
SmartForm: Toolbar now has a stable Id
SmartForm: docu correction for the extends tag of the group
SmartForm: execute setLabelFor for non-SmartFields
SmartLabel: Non SmartField use case issue solved
SmartLabel: Reset binding for required after destroying FieldControl
SmartLabel: delay updateLabel call until inner controls are created
SmartTable/SmartChart: ignore changes from liveMode SmartFilter
SmartTable: cleanup unused table template controls
SmartTable: consider "context" change on binding for force update
SmartTable: correct wrapping when using SmartToggle
SmartTable: create toolbar content, only if control is initialised
SmartTable: creation of SmartLink in display mode of SmartToggle
SmartVariant: correction for the variant downport check
SmartVariants: clone the change content during retrieval
SmartVariants: generalize the notification of initialized variants
VariantManagement: enhance managed dialog display
VariantManagement: enhancing duplicate check for standard variant name
VariantManagement: move focus to cancel in manage dialog
VariantManagement: provide an invisible text for the delete column
VariantManagement: use 'em' as max-width dimension
sap.ui.comp...SmartTable: Check for failing Excel export added
sap.ui.comp.SmartMicroChart: Documentation for Title and Description updated
sap.ui.comp.navpopover.NavigationPopoverHandler - show() method is robust also for not API conform calls
sap.ui.comp.navpopover.SemanticObjectController - semantic object with empty list is valid case
sap.ui.comp.navpopover.SmartLink - fire innerNavigate event also on direct navigation
sap.ui.comp.navpopover.SmartLink - writing of 'ariaLabelledBy' by sap.m.Link is not cumbered
sap.ui.comp.navpopover.Util - 'type' of PhoneNumberType and EmailAddressType is not mandatory
sap.ui.comp.navpopover.Util - check for ODataModel
sap.ui.comp.personalization.Controller : invalidate sap.ui.table.Table
sap.ui.comp.personlilzation: restore fix
variantManagement: default variant flag was lost in UI2 scenarios
SmartTable: support GroupBy option of UI.PresentationVariant
FilterBar: correction for cancel in filters dialog
FilterBar: liveMode related corrections
FilterBar: separate more filters indicator with leading comma
SmartField: Change event for ComboBox now contains correct parameters
SmartField: adding a fail safe check in the editable formatter
SmartFilterBar: interpret SelectOption operator "CP" as "Contains"
SmartLabel: register for innerControlsCreated event of SmartField
SmartTable/SmartChart: enhance dirty overlay handling
SmartField: FieldControl will no longer remove original binding
sap.ui.comp.navpopover.SemanticObjectController - revert of fix (Gerrit change 1840185 - deletion of _prefetchNavigationTargets)
FilterBar: adapt buttons to RTL
FilterBar: destroy VM when it is not part of the ui-tree
FilterBar: do not create INTERNAL group in F4 modus
FilterBar: in advanced mode hide the expand button if no filters are set
FilterProvider: create initial model for analytical parameters
SmartField: Binding issue for TextArea solved
SmartField: Duplicate id issue for UOM unit solved
SmartField: Object status can now be displayed without icon if criticality is not bound
SmartForm: Layout issue if no group is added is now solved
SmartForm: Tooltip is no longer cleared if set by SmartLabel
SmartTable: Date is now aligned correctly in right-to-left mode when using SmartFields
SmartTable: always Right align numeric & date content in RTL mode
SmartTable: create/use own style for making currency fields bold
SmartVariantManagementUI2: correction for basic search handling
FilterBar: fix for not displayed hide/show button in advanced mode
FilterBar: optimize resizing behavior in non toolbar mode
SmartField: Value for editable is now stored and reset during destroy of field control
VariantConverterFrom: consider analytical parameters
SmartField: Support DateTimePicker for Edm.DateTime
FilterBar: recalculate filter width for the new design
FilterBar: set focus while executing the filters dialog
SmartField: Aria label will now be set to inner control
SmartField: Duplicate id issue in table scenario solved
SmartField: Mandatory check issue for TextArea solved
SmartField: Read-only ComboBox tooltip issue solved
SmartForm: Layout data issue if useHorizontalLayout solved
VariantConverterTo: correction for the analytical parameters
sap.ui.comp.smartfield.SmartField: calling .destroy() should not throw an error
SmartField: Support DateTimePicker for Edm.DateTimeOffset
SmartLabel: aria-labelledby issue for complex SmartFields solved
SmartTable: redo bindArrgregation when a column is made visible
ValueHelpProvider: fix for supportMultiSelect  assignment
FilterBar: fix for reset behavior, when no perso key is set
FilterBar: in case of usage as SmartFilterBar ignore the group name check
SmartFilterBar: correction for parameters of datetime types
SmartFilterBar: ignore non visible analytical parameters
sap.ui.comp.odata.MetadataAnalyser: check for UI.IsImageURL
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmartMicroChart: Explored example description corrected
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmartMicroChart: isResponsive property handling for SmartRadialMicroChart corrected
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmartMicroChart: Usages of ResourceModel for associated labels corrected
